long_description: A small version of the adult-sized Chest Mount harness, the GoPro Junior Chesty Mount harness is perfect for kids and even pets. Capture immersive footage of skiing, skateboarding, slides and swings. Footage filmed from the chest captures more of arms and legs in action than footage filmed from a helmet. Adjustable chest harness is made of elastic webbing with polycarbonate hardware. Includes a vertical surface "J-hook" buckle. The GoPro Junior Chesty Mount harness is compatible with all GoPro cameras. Warning: not for children under 3 years; adult supervision required at all times; store in a safe place away from children.
short_description: A small version of the adult-sized Chest Mount harness, the GoPro Junior Chesty Mount harness is perfect for kids and even pets. Capture immersive footage of skiing, skateboarding, slides and swings.
